events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer case has been categorized under refund due to their request for returning the jacket and obtaining money back.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. to handle the customer's return and refund process.
Hello! Iâ€™m Lisa, here to help you with your return and refund request. Could you please confirm the order number and reason for the return?
To proceed with your refund, can you also specify if the product label is still attached and if the item is unused?
The order number is 8793245. The jacket is in perfect condition with all tags intact, I just want to return it because it does not fit.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket via the prepaid shipping label we will email you within 24 hours. Once received, we will issue a full refund within 3 business days.
Sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the shipping label soon.
We have sent the prepaid return shipping label to your email address. Please use it to send back the jacket at your convenience.
Checking in to confirm if you were able to ship the jacket back and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
I shipped the jacket yesterday and will wait for the refund. Thanks for your help and good service!
The refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method. We are closing this case now, thank you for contacting us.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service in the future.
